title: Nami's Ebb and Flow half working
body: This has been an issue for the last few patches. I main support and I play Nami a lot. Recently around when Bard was released, it seemed that Nami's Ebb and Flow only works half its healing capacity for allies. When in game (Summoner's Rift or ARAM) I check how much it is supposed to heal and when I heal an ally, they get half of what they should actually be healed for. I tested this in a custom match with a bot, and it sometimes heals full and sometimes it heals half.

replies.body: I just want to be sure that you are aware that they debuffed all healing in ARAM to only work for 50%?
He said he tested it with a bot though, and you can't use bots on Howling Abyss.  Weird.

His report is not very detailed and he has not a single screenshot or a video. He said he did it in both ARAM and SR, and said sometimes it's half sometimes it is full; without him providing anything else, it's not a stretch to think he was seeing half on HA and full on SR.
Yup, if you're only seeing reduced healing on Howling Abyss, this is working as intended.
